column2: 5. When they see this road sign, drivers should:

21. When driving behind a motorcycle:
column4: allow at least 4 seconds of following distance.
column6: allow at least 2 seconds of following distance.
column8: allow a following distance of at least 2 car lengths.

column2: 22. To check your blind spot before changing lanes:
column4: look over your shoulder in the direction you plan to move.
column8: look into the right side mirror.
column10: look into the left side mirror.

column2: 23. When a stop is required at an intersection with no stop line or crosswalk:
column4: Drivers should stop only at a place where the driver can see at least 100 feet on either side.
column6: Drivers are required to slow down to make sure crossing traffic is clear.
column8: Drivers should stop at the point nearest the intersecting roadway where the driver has a view of approaching traffic on the intersecting roadway before actually entering the roadway.
column10: Drivers are not required to stop.

column2: 24. You may not pass another vehicle on either side of a _______ centerline.

column4: Keep your vehicle in good condition.
column6: Do not drive if you are very weary.

column2: 26. When making a turn, drivers must _____ their speed.
